Outside.Body: You arrive at the entrance of a cave.

Main Hall.Body:
You seem to be in a large chamber.
On your left there looks to be a long corridor.
In front of you stands a large door that requires a large key.
On your right is a doorway that leads to another room.

Small Cellar.Body:
You descend downward and reach a small cellar.
You are confronted by a podium.
Atop the podium sits a large key.

Big Key.Body: You take the key and return to the Corridor.

Small Loot.Body:
You exit the corridor on the other side, you think...
it all just stopped abruptly and leaves you standing in front of a small chest.

Small Looted.Body: You open the chest and find a small amount of loot.

Cluttered Room.Body:
You are in a room filled with a ton of random things, but three things stand out to you.
In the corner of the room is a messy bed. Along the far wall, there is a rather large pile of clothes.
Along the wall closest to you stands a bookshelf, it looks unusually tidy for the room that it's in.
You decide to...

Bed.Body: You rip aside the sheets and find a small key under the pillow.

Clothes Pile.Body:
You rummage through the clothes, throwing them over your head.
You dont find anything useful and are fairly sure non of those clothes were clean.

Bookcase.Body:
You glide over to the bookcase.
Looking carefully over each book, you notice a few books that seem like they have been read more than the others.

Books.Body:
In your hands, the books' titles read "The Legend of Herobrine",
"The Works of Mumbo", and "The Trials of Technoblade".

Secret Button.Body:
You turn them over and look them through. There's nothing of note in them,
in fact the pages look as if the books were brand new.
Your hopes falling, you begin to place the books back.
At the last second you notice a small button in the back of the case.

Pressed Button.Body: You press the button and wait anxiously. Nothing seems to happen.

Treasure Room.Body: You are in a massive room filled floor to ceiling.
Treasure Room.Kitty_0: The cat pays you no mind
Treasure Room.Kitty_3: You hear the cat breathing heavier, almost anxiously.

End Screen.Body: You head home, content with your adventure.
